Hero.title: Honesty
Hero.paragraph: An internationally recognized testing and evaluation organization that enables it to produce educated and competitive market individuals.

Hero.title: Transparency
Hero.paragraph: An internationally recognized testing and evaluation organization that enables it to produce educated and competitive market individuals.

Objectives.title: Quality Tests
Objectives.paragraph: Conducting effective, transparent and international quality tests to assess candidates' qualifications, abilities, training and employment

Objectives.title: Operational gaps
Objectives.paragraph: Conducting research on education, technical and assessment programs to identify existing educational and operational gaps in programs

Objectives.title: Development standards
Objectives.paragraph: Generating and disseminating information and research on education and technology development standards

Objectives.title: Capacity building
Objectives.paragraph: Capacity building of individuals and educational institutions through training and assessment

FAQS.question: What is your need of emergence?
FAQS.answer: In response to the urgent need for an assessment service in the National recruitment policies and the Policy of the Government of Azad Jammu & Kashmir ‘Kashmir Testing Service (KTS) was established in September 2021.  KTS , being Azad Kashmir’s first and an independent, premier testing agency, which conducts tests and evaluates student admissions, scholarships, recruitment and promotional purposes. It is governed by a Management Committee.

FAQS.question: What is your Vision?
FAQS.answer: An internationally recognized testing and evaluation organization that enables it to produce  educated and competitive market individuals.

FAQS.question: What is your Mission?
FAQS.answer: To develop and promote educational and professional testing and assessment standards.

FAQS.question: What is your policy?
FAQS.answer: High quality testing of International Standards .Ensure merit based selection Justice for all.  KTS aims to conduct tests and assessments fairly and independently.

Mission.title: Mission
Mission.paragraph: To develop and promote educational and professional testing and assessment standards.

Vision.title: Vision
Vision.paragraph: An internationally recognized testing and evaluation organization that enables it to produce educated and competitive market individuals.

About.Mission: To develop and promote educational and professional testing and assessment standards.
